text: Ungku Abdul Aziz bin Ungku Abdul Hamid (28 January 1922 - 15 December 2020) was an English-born Malaysian economist. He was the First General Director of the Council on Language and Literature of Malaysia from 1956 to 1957. Aziz was the former Vice-Chancellor of the University of Malaya from 1968 to 1988. He was born in London. Aziz died on 15 December 2020 in Kuala Lumpur at the age of 98.Academic giant Royal Prof Ungku Aziz dies at 98 ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Asia ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Malaysian academics Category:Economists
title: Ungku Abdul Aziz
